com.bham.bd.audio

Class AudioSemiAutomatedTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.audio.AudioSemiAutomatedTest

  • public class AudioSemiAutomatedTest
extends Object

    Semi-automated audio tests

    This class requires user interaction to verify the audio manager functions are working correctly.

    • loopPropertyShouldWork() - to check how loop property works on each player
    • shouldFinishOnLastStem() - to check if the parallel player's onEndOfAudio property works correctly
    • hasEffectOnAudio() - to check if audio manager responds correctly to its method calls

      Gets layout to test audio player functions (e.g., playMusic(), setVolume())
      private VBox getLoopPlayground()
      Gets the layout to test 3 types of player with loop property off and the same 3 types of players with loop property off.
      VBox getParallelPlayground()
      Gets layout with a button which starts a parallel player with loop property on

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioSemiAutomatedTest

    • Method Detail

      • getLoopPlayground

        private VBox getLoopPlayground()
        Gets the layout to test 3 types of player with loop property off and the same 3 types of players with loop property off. Stopping the player and controlling audio here is also possible.
        Returns:
        layout with 6 buttons which start a player, 1 which stops it and a slider to control volume

      • getParallelPlayground

        public VBox getParallelPlayground()
        Gets layout with a button which starts a parallel player with loop property on
        Returns:
        layout with start and stop buttons and a slider to control music volume

      • getInputPlayground

        public VBox getInputPlayground()
        Gets layout to test audio player functions (e.g., playMusic(), setVolume())
        Returns:
        layout with start and stop buttons and a slider to control music volume
